demos.name: System Identification
demos.description:
The System Identification Toolbox is a collection of MATLAB functions for building models of systems and signals from observed data.

The toolbox supports all common methods for this, like AR, ARX, ARMAX, Box-Jenkins, State-space models, etc. It also covers tailor-made linear models of any internal structure, and handles systems with an arbitrary number of inputs and outputs.

A convenient GUI covers most of the functions and gives the user complete control over the models created during whole sessions.
